text.autoconfig.trulytreasures.title: Truly Treasures Configuration
text.autoconfig.trulytreasures.option.wa: Base value used to calculate the price of every possible treasure enchantment book trade
Enchantments that don't use levels (e.g Mending) will always use this value multiplied by 2
Enchantments that DO use levels (e.g Frost Walker) will use this value multiplied by their level
Maximum number of times you can buy from the same treasure enchantment book trade
Whether wandering traders should be able to sell curse enchantments or not
List of treasure enchantments that should not be sold by wandering traders
Entries must be their full ID. Example: minecraft:frost_walker
text.autoconfig.trulytreasures.option.vi: List of treasure enchantments that should not be removed villagers
Entries must be their full ID. Example: minecraft:frost_walker
